video_prompt: Slow pan across a vast desert canyon at sunrise/sunset. Golden light beams pierce the air, shifting as the sun rises/sets. Long, stretching shadows recede as three figures walk towards an SUV. Vehicle lights briefly flash on.
image_prompt: Vertical desert canyon at sunrise/sunset, warm light, long shadows. Intricate, layered reddish-brown canyon walls flank a dirt road. Orange and yellow sky with light rays. Dark grey SUV with roof rack parked centrally, facing viewer. Three hikers with backpacks walk away from viewer towards the SUV, their long shadows stretching forward. Rugged texture, deep atmosphere, adventure.
refined_video_prompt: A slow camera pan traverses a desert canyon. Golden light dynamically shifts, its beams moving and altering in intensity. Shadows steadily recede as three figures advance towards a vehicle. Its lights then briefly flash on.
